label: main
info:
Flow to receive commands and values from
external web socket, split the equipment name
out of the command and send the remaining
command to the appropriate flowto be handled
by the equipment. 

Expected message format from external web
socket connection is as follows:
`msg.topic` (string) defines the equipment
    and command.
    example: msg.topic = TCU:1|BATH:TEMP:PV
        equipment is seprated by command by
        "|"
        Within equipment and command items
        are seperated by ":"
        
`msg.paylod` (str|number|object): provides
    the values to send to the equipment defined
    by the msg.topic.

name: format mqtt
func:
flow.set("topic", msg.topic);
return msg;

name: select topic
read register Pumpout1
read buffer
AO_01_RAW read holding register %AQ1 address 0 - FC3
func:
msg.payload = { 'fc': 3, 'unitid': 253, 'address': 0 , 'quantity': 1 }
return msg;

name: AI1_Raw Read input register %AI1  FC4 - 0
func:
msg.payload = { 'fc': 4, 'unitid': 253, 'address': 0 , 'quantity': 1 }
return msg;

name: format response
format data

template:
<canvas id="line-chart" width="2" height="1" style="border:1px solid #000000;"></canvas>

<script>
new Chart(document.getElementById("line-chart"), {
  type: 'line',
  data: {
    labels: [{{{payload.labels}}}],
    datasets: [{ 
        data: [{{{payload.data}}}],
        label: "crystallizer 1",
        borderColor: "#3e95cd",
        fill: false
      }
    ]
  },
  options: {
    title: {
      display: true,
      text: 'IR 1'
    }
  }
});

</script>

name: extract point
func:
msg.payload= msg.payload["data"][flow.get("peak1")];
return msg;

name: peak selection
label: selected peak
tooltip: enter peak position to be tracked

name: format data

template:
<canvas id="line-chart" width="3" height="1" style="border:1px solid #000000;"></canvas>

<script>
new Chart(document.getElementById("line-chart"), {
  type: 'line',
  data: {
    labels: [{{{payload.labels}}}],
    datasets: [{ 
        data: [{{{payload.data}}}],
        label: "crystallizer 1",
        borderColor: "#3e95cd",
        fill: false
      }
    ]
  },
  options: {
    title: {
      display: true,
      text: 'Raw IR spectra'
    }
  }
});

</script>

return msg;
